name: pp-self-hosted
description: PP Self Hosted - SafeVision Content Filter

scripts.dev: npm run kill:all && npm run start:sequential
scripts.start:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" --names "SAFEVISION,BACKEND,FRONTEND" "npm run dev:safevision" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.restart: npm run kill:all && sleep 2 && npm run start:sequential
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
